src:
3 Posisi Jaksa Kosong, Jaksa Agung Tunggu Keputusan Presiden
01 Nov 2019, 19:31 by Andita Rahma, Budi Riza
Jakarta - Kejaksaan Agung masih menunggu Keputusan Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi untuk mengisi tiga jabatan eselon satu, yang telah kosong sejak lama.
"Nanti, ya, kami masih tunggu Keputusan Presiden," ujar Jaksa Agung ST Burhanuddin di kantornya, Jakarta Selatan pada Jumat,1 November 2019.
Burhanuddin mengatakan, tiga jabatan kosong itu adalah Jaksa Agung Muda bidang Pembinaan, Jaksa Agung Muda bidang Pidana Umum, dan Jaksa Agung Muda bidang Perdata dan Tata Usaha Negara.
Burhanuddin masih enggan menyebutkan nama calon yang akan mengisi tiga jabatan kosong itu. Ada kemungkinan posisi kosong itu akan diisi oleh eselon satu lain dengan cara rotasi, atau eselon lain yang dipromosikan jabatannya.
Sementara untuk saat ini, posisi Jaksa Agung Muda bidang Pidana Umum diisi oleh Pelaksana Tugas (Plt) Ali Mukartono. Dan posisi Jaksa Agung Muda bidang Perdata dan Tata Usaha Negara diisi oleh Tarmidzi.

ANDITA RAHMA
text:
3 Vacant Prosecutor Position, Attorney General Awaits Presidential Decree
Nov 01 2019, 19:31 by Andita Rahma, Budi Riza
Jakarta - The Attorney General's Office is still waiting for President Joko Widodo's or Jokowi's decision to fill three echelon one positions, which have been vacant for a long time.
"Later, yes, we are still waiting for the Presidential Decree," said Attorney General ST Burhanuddin in his office, South Jakarta on Friday, November 1, 2019.
Burhanuddin said that the three vacant positions were the Deputy Attorney General for Coaching, the Deputy Attorney General for Public Crimes, and the Deputy Attorney General for Civil and State Administration.
Burhanuddin was still reluctant to mention the names of candidates who would fill the three vacant positions. It is possible that the vacant position will be filled by another echelon by rotation, or another echelon promoted to his position.
Meanwhile, for the time being, the position of Deputy Attorney General in the field of General Crimes is filled by Acting Actor Ali Mukartono. And the position of the Deputy Attorney General for Civil and Administrative Affairs was filled by Tarmidzi.

ANDITA RAHMA
